data.name: Anxiety and Stress of being home bound and coping with them adequately
data.summary:
- Challenges posed by the work from home situation brought about by the COVID lockdown with relation to different types of stressors and anxieties.

- Stressors related to people and environmental situations that are ever-changing and needs constant adaptation flexibility in dealing with these stressors.

- Simple methods to manage the anxiety associated with work - organization, networking and completion for meeting deadlines, related to childcare and home management.
